original_text:
And she did not know
    that it was I who gave her
    the grain, the wine, and the oil,
and who lavished on her silver and gold,
    which they used for Baal.
korean_text: 곡식과 새 포도주와 기름은 내가 그에게 준 것이요 그들이 바알을 위하여 쓴 은과 금도 내가 그에게 더하여 준 것이거늘 그가 알지 못하도다

sentences.original_text: that it was I who gave her
the grain, the wine, and the oil,
and who lavished on her silver and gold,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 은과 금을 풍성하게 주었다는 것을
